奴隷制度廃止: (どれいせいどはいし) - abolition of slavery
奴隷労働: (どれいろうどう) - slave labor; slave labour
奴隷根性: (どれいこんじょう) - (yoji) servile character (disposition)
奴隷王朝: (どれいおうちょう) - Slave Dynasty (of India, 1206-1290 CE); Mamluk Dynasty
奴隷解放: (どれいかいほう) - emancipation of slaves
奴隷道徳: (どれいどうとく) - Sklavenmoral (slave morality, as a philosophical concept of Nietzsche)
奴頭: (やっこあたま) - Edo-period hairstyle worn by samurai's attendants
奴髭: (やっこひげ) - sickle-shaped moustache (often worn by servants in the Edo period)
奸佞邪智: (かんねいじゃち) - (yoji) wiles and cunning; craftiness and treachery
奸佞邪知: (かんねいじゃち) - (yoji) wiles and cunning; craftiness and treachery
奸策: (かんさく) - shrewd (dirty) trick; sinister scheme (design); sly art
奸臣: (かんしん) - disloyal retainer; treacherous subject
奸計: (かんけい) - trick; evil design; sharp practice
好い: (よい) - (also いい (all senses)) good/excellent/fine/nice/pleasant/agreeable; sufficient (can be used to turn down an offer)/ready/prepared; profitable (e.g. deal, business offer, etc.)/beneficial; OK
好いこと: (よいこと) - good thing/nice thing; (usu. as 〜を良いことに(して))  good excuse/good grounds/good opportunity; interjection used to impress an idea or to urge a response
好いとこ取り: (よいとこどり) - focusing on only the good points or strong points; incorporating the benefits (while ignoring the drawbacks); picking the best of both (everything); cherry-picking (e.g. information)
好い事: (よいこと) - good thing/nice thing; (usu. as 〜を良いことに(して))  good excuse/good grounds/good opportunity; interjection used to impress an idea or to urge a response
好い仲: (いいなか) - love for one another
好い加減: (いいかげん) - irresponsible/perfunctory/careless; lukewarm/half-baked/halfhearted/vague; reasonable/moderate (usu. in suggestions or orders); considerably/quite/rather/pretty
好い加減にする: (いいかげんにする) - to put an end to something; to get something over with; to quit something one has been engaged in too long or to an excessive degree
好い子になる: (いいこになる) - to make oneself popular without any regard to others; to take all the credit to oneself
好い子ぶる: (いいこぶる) - to act the goody-goody; to pretend to be nice
好い気味: (いいきび) - it serves you (him) right; it's what you (he) deserves
好い線: (よいせん) - more or less right; you are on the right track; getting warm
好い線を行く: (よいせんをいく) - to be on the right track; to go well
好い線行く: (よいせんいく) - to be on the right track; to go well
好い顔: (いいかお) - big-shot/influential person; happy face/smiling face; sympathetic attitude
好い鴨: (いいカモ) - desirable prey; easy game; easy mark; easy prey; easy target
好かろう: (よかろう) - that's right; very well; it would be best to ...
好き: (suki) - liked, well-liked, favourite, favorite; in love (com), loved, romantically interested (in) , liked, well-liked, favourite, favorite; in love (with), loved, romantically interested (in); faddism, eccentricity; the way one likes, (as) it suits one
好きこそ物の上手なれ: (すきこそもののじょうずなれ) - What one likes, one will do well
好きでも嫌いでも: (すきでもきらいでも) - (usu. 〜...ない, etc.)  like it or not; like or not like
好きなだけ: (すきなだけ) - all you want; as much as one wants
好きなときに: (すきなときに) - whenever you want; any time you like
好きなように: (すきなように) - as you want; as you will
好きな時に: (すきなときに) - whenever you want; any time you like
好きにする: (すきにする) - to do as one likes
好きになる: (すきになる) - to come to like; to become fond of; to fall in love
好き勝手: (すきかって) - doing whatever one pleases
好き同士: (すきどうし) - lover; boyfriend; girlfriend; soul mate
好き好む: (すきこのむ) - to do something by choice; to like; to be fond of
好き嫌い: (すききらい) - likes and dislikes; pickiness (about food); choosiness; fussiness; tastes; preferences
好き放題: (すきほうだい) - self-indulgence; doing as one pleases
好し: (えし) - (adj-ku)  good; excellent; fine; nice; pleasant; agreeable
好ましからざる: (このましからざる) - unwelcome; unwanted; undesirable
好ましからざる人物: (このましからざるじんぶつ) - persona non grata; unwelcome person; undesirable person
好まれる: (このまれる) - to like; to appreciate; to have a preference
好みにより: (このみにより) - depending on one's preference
好むと好まざるとにかかわらず: (このむとこのまざるとにかかわらず) - whether one likes it or not
好んで: (このんで) - by (from) choice; by (for) preference; of one's own accord; of one's (own) free will; on purpose; deliberately; intentionally
好カード: (こうカード) - drawcard; attractive program; good match; good game
好下物: (こうかぶつ) - favorite snack to have with drinks; favourite snack to have with drinks
好中球: (こうちゅうきゅう) - neutrophil; neutrophilic leukocyte
好事多魔: (こうじたま) - (yoji) Happy events are often accompanied by difficulties; Unsullied joy is rare
好事家: (こうずか) - dilettante; person of fantastic taste
好事魔多し: (こうじまおおし) - Lights are usually followed by shadows
好人物: (こうじんぶつ) - good-natured person; nice person
好位: (こうい) - favourable position (esp. in horse racing, e.g. in 3rd to 5th place during a race)
好位置: (こういち) - good position; favourable situation
好加減: (いいかげん) - irresponsible/perfunctory/careless; lukewarm/half-baked/halfhearted/vague; reasonable/moderate (usu. in suggestions or orders); considerably/quite/rather/pretty
好印象: (こういんしょう) - good impression; favorable impression
好取組: (こうとりくみ) - good game or match
